text: Ezɨ Apolos Akaian mangasava amima, Efesusɨn itir Kraisɨn adarasi, gavgavim a ganɨdi, egha a iniasa Akaian suren gumaziba bagha akɨnafarim osiri. Apolos Akaian otozir dughiamɨn, a nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itir darazi akurvazir ekiam me gami. God men apangkufi, kamaghɨn amizɨ, me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn iti.
